divs: Sighting DetailsI've been watching objects like this for around a month now, not every day but 4-5 nights a week they're around. I've made reports previously but have not had a good enough camera to film at night. I borrowed my mother-in-laws Canon DC420 and was able to get the footage attached to this report. The camera records directly to a mini dvd. I converted the *vob file to an *.avi so anyone could view the file, but the original is a little clearer. I have a total of about 40 minutes of footage so far but am only uploading just a few minutes worth due to the size of the file.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Claremore
There were no other sightings in Claremore on or around July 3rd 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: UFO Changing colors in the sky.
